title: Rider Wins 72kg of Cheese but ‘Doesn’t Really Like It’, Pogačar Blasts Roubaix KoMs, Vollering Consoles Van Aert
content:
Tadej Pogačar stuffs two notorious cobblestone sectors into his collection of Strava KoMs; Lander Loockx wins bodyweight in a cheese he doesn't like.

Read the full article at Rider Wins 72kg of Cheese but ‘Doesn’t Really Like It’, Pogačar Blasts Roubaix KoMs, Vollering Consoles Van Aert on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
